name: Unstoppable (BeneDev)
description:
Are you strong enough to find your way home? You are your home planets last hope! Explore, get new power and survive on your journey back to your home planet in a charming pixelated universe! Get your energy from planets - choose the peaceful way and use their orbits to get from planet to planet or destroy them all by taking their power - at a risk, don’t get busted by enemies and black holes which are lurking around in deep space! 

Let yourself be guided by your own light of Hope.

Controls

-Move around by moving your Mouse

-Circle around and Harvest Planets by holding right-click

-Boost forward by left-click

Art by Gian Paolo Licata, Ollosaurus, Crayonhead

Music by Scott Buckley

Programming by Philipp Staymann

Programming and VFX by Me
